content: Hello, I am new here and new to FHIR. Is there any online course in FHIR where I could get started in a more organized and incremental way from an implementation point of view?
I am already having a look here http://hl7.org/fhir/ and this is too vast and I an confused where to start.

There's a little section at the top of hl7.org/fhir that provides recommended reading if you're just getting started. There's also some good presentations that are publicly available. https://vimeo.com/191770214 https://vimeo.com/191939891

There's a little section at the top of hl7.org/fhir that provides recommended reading if you're just getting started. There's also some good presentations that are publicly available. https://vimeo.com/191770214 https://vimeo.com/191939891

Thank you @Lloyd McKenzie
You may find this useful from a beginnerâ€™s perspective: https://fhir-drills.github.io/
+1 on fhir-drills site interactive step by step walk-through has some good positive feedback from Australian connectathons
